oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Guests of Martha Dobson, from the Nashville Times, 1940
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A captioned photo from the Nashville Times (1940), about the guests of Miss Martha Dobson. The caption reads: “Popular visitors in Nashville for the festivities that marked the opening week of the New Year were Miss Virginia Moseley of Bowling Green, Ky., right, and Miss Judy Frazier of Tacoma, Wash., left, who were guests of Miss Martha Dobson, center, at the home of her parents, Mr. and Mrs. Allen Dobson, on Jackson Boulevard. Miss Moseley and Miss Frazier are both students at Finch Junior College in New York, and Miss Dobson attends Gunston Hall in Washington.” Forms part of the Nashville Times newspaper collection. 1 digital photo.
